data.message:
http://moneymy.com/ #Moneymy.com is a new innovating job site, where you will be hired to do some task, different in type and number. and you will be paid a estimated reward for that instant in your account, you will be paid for your work via western union, cheque and money order. Money gram is also coming soon. You have to create a account with us to start and login to your member area, and do daily your jobs and make some cash at home as part-time job!
We guarantee you that you will earn 1500$ in your first week by simple task of 5 - 10 minute

25$ Signup Bonus !
